text: :sprocky: Hi my name is Sprocky, how can I help?

As part of an effort to make it more obvious the chrome extension is community driven and not an official HubSpot product, <@U6W3H6YN8> has transferred ownership of the git repo to me.

*New ownership. Same great hair!*
<https://github.com/TheWebTech/HubSpot-Developer-Extension>

If you’re wondering where Sprocky went, he is now an opt-in feature. He’s still around, and his toggle is still in the chrome extension. I apologize if you previously did the toggle off then back on trick. That did not carry over, the way we stored the preference we could not do that. That said he’s easy to enable find him in the develop tab.

His X has been made easier to see/click, and a few quotes were added, and some redundant ones removed.
